verses.verse: But in the latter<WH319> days<WH3117> it shall come to pass<WH2022>, that the mountain of Jehovah<WH3068>'s house<WH1004> shall be established<WH3559> on the top<WH7218> of the mountains<WH2022>, and it shall be exalted<WH5375> above the hills<WH1389>; and peoples<WH5971> shall flow unto it<WH5102>.

And many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> shall go<WH1980> and say<WH559>, Come<WH3212> ye<WH5927>, and let us go up to the mountain<WH2022> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and to the house<WH1004> of the God<WH430> of Jacob<WH3290>; and he will teach<WH3384> us of his ways<WH1870>, and we will walk<WH3212> in his paths<WH734>. For out of Zion<WH6726> shall go forth<WH3318> the law<WH8451>, and the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> from Jerusalem<WH3389>;

and he will judge<WH8199> between many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971>, and will decide<WH3198> concerning strong<WH6099> nations<WH1471> afar off<WH7350>: and they shall beat<WH3807> their swords<WH2719> into plowshares<WH855>, and their spears<WH2595> into pruning-hooks<WH4211>; nation<WH1471> shall not lift up<WH5375> sword<WH2719> against nation<WH1471>, neither shall they learn<WH3925> war any more<WH4421>.

But they shall sit<WH3427> every man<WH376> under his vine<WH1612> and under his fig-tree<WH8384>; and none shall make them afraid<WH2729>: for the mouth<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> hath spoken it<WH1696>.

For all the peoples<WH5971> walk<WH3212> every one<WH376> in the name<WH8034> of his god<WH430>; and we will walk<WH3212> in the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>.

In that day<WH3117>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, will I assemble<WH622> that which is lame<WH6760>, and I will gather<WH6908> that which is driven away<WH5080>, and that which I have afflicted<WH7489>;

and I will make<WH7760> that which was lame<WH6760> a remnant<WH7611>, and that which was cast far off<WH1972> a strong<WH6099> nation<WH1471>: and Jehovah<WH3068> will reign<WH4427> over them in mount<WH2022> Zion<WH6726> from henceforth even for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>.

And thou<WH4026>, O tower of the flock<WH5739>, the hill<WH6076> of the daughter<WH1323> of Zion<WH6726>, unto thee shall it come<WH857>, yea<WH7223>, the former dominion<WH4475> shall come<WH935>, the kingdom<WH4467> of the daughter<WH1323> of Jerusalem<WH3389>.

Now why dost thou cry<WH7321> out aloud<WH7452>? Is there no king<WH4428> in thee<WH3289>, is thy counsellor perished<WH6>, that pangs<WH2427> have taken<WH2388> hold of thee as of a woman in travail<WH3205>?

Be in pain<WH2342>, and labor to bring forth<WH1518>, O daughter<WH1323> of Zion<WH6726>, like a woman in travail<WH3205>; for now shalt thou go forth<WH3318> out<WH3318> of the city<WH7151>, and shalt dwell<WH7931> in the field<WH7704>, and shalt come even unto Babylon<WH894>: there shalt thou be rescued<WH5337>; there will Jehovah<WH3068> redeem<WH1350> thee from the hand<WH3709> of thine enemies<WH341>.
And now many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> are assembled<WH622> against thee<WH559>, that say, Let her be defiled<WH2610>, and let our eye<WH5869> see<WH2372> our desire upon Zion<WH6726>.

But they know<WH3045> not the thoughts<WH4284> of Jehovah<WH3068>, neither understand<WH995> they his counsel<WH6098>; for he hath gathered<WH6908> them as the sheaves<WH5995> to the threshing-floor<WH1637>.

Arise <WH6965> and thresh<WH1758>, O daughter<WH1323> of Zion<WH6726>; for I will make<WH7760> thy horn<WH7161> iron<WH1270>, and I will make<WH7760> thy hoofs<WH6541> brass<WH5154>; and thou shalt beat in pieces<WH1854> many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971>: and I will devote<WH2763> their gain<WH1215> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, and their substance<WH2428> unto the Lord<WH3068> of the whole earth<WH776>.
